name: crack_getlastmessage
purpose: Returns the message from the last obscure check

return.description:
The message from the last obscure check or FALSE if there was no obscure
   checks made so far.The returned message is one of:
   
    
     
      it's WAY too short
     
    
    
     
      it is too short
     
    
    
     
      it does not contain enough DIFFERENT characters
     
    
    
     
      it is all whitespace
     
    
    
     
      it is too simplistic/systematic
     
    
    
     
      it looks like a National Insurance number.
     
    
    
     
      it is based on a dictionary word
     
    
    
     
      it is based on a (reversed) dictionary word
     
    
    
     
      strong password
